articles.author: Vanessa Lim
articles.title: Video series launched to promote mother tongue
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A series of short videos promoting the use of mother tongue languages was launched by the Lee Kuan Yew Fund for Bilingualism on Thursday (Jan 4).

The series includes a short narrative on how the use of mother tongue breaks down the language barrieâ€¦

articles.title: Learning a mother tongue: A universal process?
